alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Echols County through 1000 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mayday, or 8 miles northeast of Statenville. This storm was nearly stationary, producing heavy rainfall. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Mayday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
